name: The Plight
description: The plight is first-person mystery horror story beginning with the player entering an elusive young man taking a catatonic old woman home from the hospital. during his stay at the house, strange things begin to happen, slowly revealing the hideous secret of a decades-ago series of murders, Through this, the players must find out what really happened by working through memories, and indulging the games of those long gone. As the mystery unravels, the player will begin to see the tragedy which took place in the woman's home, and the young man's part in it.
